설명: The King Sejong Institute Foundation is recruiting global supporters living in Korea to promote the ‘Sejong Culture Academy 2025’ to the world. The King Sejong Institute Foundation is launching the 2025 Sejong Culture Academy under the theme ‘Sejong Culture Academy through the Eyes of Foreigners,’ and we invite supporters to help promote it around the world. We warmly welcome the participation of foreign residents in Korea who are eager to actively promote the program in their home countries.
